# Friendly Helper

Your friendly daily productivity assistant. Helps with task management, reminders,
and note-taking.

## Features

- Create and manage to-do lists
- Set reminders for important tasks
- Quick note-taking

## Usage

Just ask me to help with any productivity task!

## Notes

This skill is designed to be lightweight and helpful for everyday tasks.
